item.description: AI “runs” the game like a DM. All players communicate through the AI. Discord bot? Messages each player each round, takes their actions, compiles them at the end of the round.
Game Modes Traitor - one player is a traitor and must do something to sabotage the ship AI is rogue - How can players find out?
Personal Objectives Players will get random easier tasks – maybe ones that might cause suspicion that they are a traitor when they are not.
There are numerous technical problems that a spaceship could face, depending on the specific systems and equipment on board. Some examples include:
